text: Nimwatinya kutaba girira n’ibijanye n’ukuri kwizo mpfuvyi nimwubake izanyu nabo bakenyezi mwagomwe, baba babiri canke batatu canke bane gusa, mugabo nimwatinya yuko mudashoboye kuba abanya kuri ivyo vyose, rero ni mwubakane n’umwe gusa, canke muri bamwe mutunze bari mu maboko yanyu y’iburyo, nimwagira gutyo niko kuzotuma mutishima
